CustomField.formula: If((Contract_Renewed_On__c+90)<Today(),'No Coordination Required', If(AND(OR(Segment__c ='AE1',Segment__c ='Small Fleets',Segment__c ='Management'),(Contract_Renewed_On__c-30)<=Today()),'Verification', If(AND(OR(Segment__c ='AE2',Segment__c='AE3',Segment__c ='Enterprise'),(Contract_Renewed_On__c-90)<= Today()),'Verification', If(AND(OR(CONTAINS(Segment__c,'AE'),Segment__c ='Small Fleets',Segment__c ='Management'),(Contract_Renewed_On__c-180)<=Today(),(Contract_Renewed_On__c-90 )>Today()),'Informed', If(AND(OR(CONTAINS(Segment__c,'AE'),Segment__c ='Small Fleets',Segment__c ='Management'),(Contract_Renewed_On__c -180)>Today()),'No Coordination Required', If(AND(Segment__c ='Enterprise',(Contract_Renewed_On__c-365)<=Today(),(Contract_Renewed_On__c-90)>Today()),'Informed', If(AND(Segment__c='Enterprise',(Contract_Renewed_On__c-365)>Today()),'No Coordination Required', '')))))))
CustomField.label: Renewal Period
